Detailed Description

Creates a message box with as many buttons as required. Creates a message box with as many buttons as required.

Creates a message box with as many buttons as required, the default is 4 buttons suitable for a save/saveAll/No/Cancel type response.

The following are examples of how it can be used

        config_mb4 mb;
        qDebug("returned %d", mb.exec());

or

        config_mb4 mb("Test text","Test caption", config_mb4::Critical,6, this);

        mb.setIconPixmap(QPixmap((const char**)qtlogo_xpm));
        mb.setButtonText(0,"Hello");
        mb.setButtonText(1,"Hello1");
        mb.setButtonText(2,"Hello2");
        mb.setButtonText(3,"Hello3");
        mb.setButtonText(4,"Hello4");
        mb.setButtonText(5,"Hello5");

        qDebug("returned %d", mb.exec());

enum config_mb4::Icon
 

enum of possible predeffined Icons

Enumerator:

Warning  Show Warning icon
Critical  Show Critical icon

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

config_mb4::config_mb4 (  uint  iNoOfButtons = 4,
QWidget *  parent = 0,
const char *  name = 0
) 
 

The function config_mb4::config_mb4( uint iNoOfButtons=4, QWidget* parent, const char* name ) : QDialog( parent, name, true, 0 ) creates a messagebox, by default with 4 buttons and the infomation icon.

  • Buttons will be labelled
    • Save
    • Save All
    • No
    • Cancel
